What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to write and draw! It's how I express myself creatively.
Those are great hobbies! I'm a big fan of knitting and crocheting.
That's cool! I can see how those hobbies could be very calming and meditative.
They definitely are!  The repetitive motions help me clear my head and come up with new ideas. What about your hobbies? Do they influence your creative process?
Absolutely! When I'm feeling stuck on a writing project, I'll often doodle to help me visualize the story.
That's a great idea! I find that knitting can sometimes inspire new patterns or designs.
I bet! It's amazing how different hobbies can intersect and influence each other.
